cast.name: 斯蒂芬妮·贝内特 Stephanie Bennett

introduction: Lisa and Tyler's marriage is on the rocks after Lisa discovers she's pregnant - she's been hoping to start a family but Tyler wants to focus on his business - an outdoor adventure outfitters - and worries being a family man will hurt his youthful, cool "brand". To save their relationship, the pair begin seeing Alana, a marriage counselor whose non-traditional ways seem to be working - at first. But after Alana convinces Lisa and Tyler to join her on a marriage retreat in the middle of nowhere, Lisa realizes their counselor has ulterior motives, and she'll be left fighting for her life, as well as the life of her unborn child.
